thread.title: Trump halts Broadcom takeover of Qualcomm

title: Trump halts Broadcom takeover of Qualcomm
text:
Trump halts Broadcom takeover of Qualcomm 10:44am EDT - 01:38 
U.S. President Donald Trump blocks microchip maker Broadcom Ltd's proposed takeover of Qualcomm Inc on national security grounds, ending what would have been the technology industry's biggest deal ever amid concerns that it would give China the upper hand in mobile communications. Ivor Bennett reports.
